tool_description: Lottery results API for the US, including all states. ## Powerball API and Megamillons API Our API includes the most popular national games, like Powerball, Mega millions and Cash for life. ## State lotteries We have coverage for all US states. Including prize data for some of those states. Provided by downtack.com
name: Lottery Results
title: Lottery Results

api_list.name: Get results by state
api_list.description:
With this endpoint you can get the results from the latest draws for a given state.
You need to provide the country code, and the state code is optional. 
If you don't provide a state code you'll get a list of results from games that are played in multiple states.

The state code should follow the ISO 3166-2, providing the 2nd part of the code as the state code.

You can get a list of available state codes in the List states endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com/games-by-state/us/ny"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com/games-by-state/{countrycode}/{statecode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: MEGA Millions and Powerball
api_list.description: This endpoints returns the results from the two biggest games in the US. It exists just for compatibilty reasons.
api_list.code:

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List states by country
api_list.description:
This endpoints allows to get a list of states available for a country.
 The country code should be given following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes. 
Currently we only support the US, so you should give the US as the country code to get the list of states.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com/list-states/us"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com/list-states/{countrycode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Games
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the results from all games by country code. Following the ISO 2 letter naming.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com/all-games/us"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lottery-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
